outline:
1. to run
    1. (Qal)
      1. to run
      2. runners (participle as subst)
    2. (Polel) to run swiftly, dart
    3. (Hiphil)
      1. to bring or move quickly, hurry
      2. to drive away from, cause to run away
kjv_def: break down, divide speedily, footman, guard, bring hastily, (make) run (away, through), post.
strongs_def: to run (for whatever reason, especially to rush)
